text:
@seanhannity @AlexBerenson @DrOz @LindseyGrahamSC @marklevinshow @KarlRove What Hannity means to say is we’ll give you and extremely Republican view on Coronavirus reporting to help you swallow Trump’s bullshit whole. Then he’ll offer an unscientific approach to opening the economy that will lead to more deaths. 
But money right???
